publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3302.1 Pauline McNeill: Scottish Law Commission Report on Title to Sue for Non-Patrimonial Loss -As an amendment to motion (S1M-3302) in the name of Robin Harper, leave out from "as a matter of urgency" to end and insert "to address this as soon as practically possible."

S1M-3302.1 Scottish Law Commission Report on Title to Sue for Non-Patrimonial Loss (lodged on 28 August 2002) Donald Gorrie*
